column4: Hello, there is something wrong with my bootsplash, when kernel start my init process, splash change from silent to verbose. what's wrong?
nice to meet you, you helped me a lot .:-)
you can install anything you like on it, if you have enough ram
Do you mean i can apt-get install in liveCD?
there are various dodgy hacks, but none are as simple as rebooting ;)
if Windows filesystem is fat32, so, edit it in wine is ok, is it?
wine has it's own fake registry, aiui
is the fake registry the same with my real registry if i mount my windows system?
so, do you mean i just edit my fake registry in linux?
I don't know how you'd point regedit at the real one
I'd guess editing the wine config would be enough
